item.title: This is a Great Video by The Nostalgia Critic
item.description:
This is a Great Video by The Nostalgia Critic

No more staying silent. The time has come to start some dialogue about Fair Use and how it's constantly being trampled on via the YouTube claim and take down system. Please Click the Show More below! Special thanks to the awesome people who appeared in this video. Adam from YourMovieSucks - Subscribe Here!

item.title: The Library of Babble is Awesome.
item.description:
The Library of Babble is Awesome.

The Library of Babble is insanely awesome. It's a collection of anything and everything that will ever be written. Literally anything you can think of is already in the library.

item.title: I Made Some Custom Lens Flares!
item.description:
I Made Some Custom Lens Flares!

I thought I'd spend a few minutes making some custom AE lens flare presets. Watch out JJ ABRAMS and @videocopilot! pic.twitter.com/sczBDiMPOE

item.title: Peep and the Big Wide World
item.description:
Peep and the Big Wide World

I was reminiscing about one of the first shows I ever watched, Peep and The Big Wide World (which is one of the greatest shows in all of history), and I found the original Film from 1962!

item.title: The Spinning Game Glitch Logo
item.description:
The Spinning Game Glitch Logo

I'm experimenting around with some 3D graphics for the next Game Glitch episode, and here's a draft render. Pretty cool looking.

item.title: Just a Quick Little Reminder...
item.description:
Just a Quick Little Reminder...

Hey! Just a reminder: The platform AveryMiller.org is currently running on is pretty awesome (TheGrid.io), but it's highly experimental, and a bit buggy at times. If you spot any bugs or anything that looks weird, send an email over to Avery@AveryMiller.org or just tweet me!

item.title: Spore - Game Glitch
item.description:
Spore - Game Glitch

Today, I take a look at some glitches in Spore. http://www.AveryMiller.org Copyright Avery Miller Subtitles are available! Disclaimer: Fair use lets me put copyrighted material in my content without explicit permission from the copyright owner. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fair_use. item.title: Some Older Drawings
item.description:
Some Older Drawings

I figured I mind as well re-post stuff from the old version of AveryMiller.org , so here's two drawings of iDubbbz and JonTron I made a few weeks ago.
